title: Shark
creator_credit: Roone Arledge, Learning Corporation of America and Scott Ransom
brief_description: Presents some of the characteristics and habits of sharks in particular the white pointer, the tiger shark, and the bronze whaler. Peter Benchley, author of “Jaws”, guides us through the ancient times to sharks to modern day. They dive near Gladstone, in Queensland, a small fishing port on the East Coast of Australia, diving in the Barrier Reef; diving also takes place in South Australia, near Seal Island.
